meanings.definition: The ability of an organism to respond to changes in temperature and light over a 24-hour period.
meanings.sent1: The bird's thermoperiodisms helped it know when to sleep and wake up.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study thermoperiodisms in animals to understand their daily routines.
meanings.sent3: The bear's thermoperiodisms were so precise, it never missed breakfast time.
meanings.sent4: Her thermoperiodisms were like a clock ticking with the rising and setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The plant's thermoperiodisms were like a dance to the rhythm of day and night.

meanings.definition: The study of the effects of temperature and light on biological rhythms.
meanings.sent1: Thermoperiodisms research helps us understand how light affects our bodies.
meanings.sent2: In thermoperiodisms studies, scientists observe how temperature impacts sleep patterns.
meanings.sent3: The class on thermoperiodisms was so interesting, it shed light on our daily routines.
meanings.sent4: Exploring thermoperiodisms is like unraveling the secrets of nature's clock.
meanings.sent5: The book on thermoperiodisms painted a vivid picture of the dance between light and life.
